QuestData.Title: Foundation for Revenge
QuestData.Description: I have something special planned for my favorite high priests. But first you get to prove yourself in laying the foundation for my revenge.$B$BYou do still want to live, yes?$B$BAs you have seen, my devotees are enjoying their stay here, but now it's time for them to make final restitution.$B$BDo me the smallest of favors if you would, $n. Lure them near my soul fonts and then put an end to their existences.$B$BThey taste so delicious, and their sacrifice will not go in vain, I can assure you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Quetz'lun's Spirit has tasked you with the destruction of 12 trolls, either Quetz'lun Worshippers or Serpent-Touched Berserkers, near her Soul Fonts.$B$BOnly after you have accomplished this should you return to her at the Altar of Quetz'lun.
QuestData.CompletionText: Why do you return when your task is not yet complete? Do you not realize that I can destroy you with but a thought?$B$BGo now, little $r. Complete that which I commanded of you!
QuestData.RewardText: Exquisite. Perhaps you will be of some use after all.

Objectives.Objective: Trolls killed near a Soul Font
